name: example
description: Example usage of sqljson-query to generate SQL queries and TypeScript result types.
author: Stephen C. Harris

scripts.start-db: npm run build-db && docker run -d --name drugs-pg --rm -p 127.0.0.1:5432:5432 --shm-size=256MB drugs-pg
scripts.gen-queries-java: node query-gen/generate-queries.js --dbmd query-gen/dbmd.json --sqlDir src/generated/sql --javaBaseDir src/generated/lib --javaQueriesPkg javapkg
scripts.gen-queries-ts: node query-gen/generate-queries.js --dbmd query-gen/dbmd.json --sqlDir src/generated/sql --tsQueriesDir src/generated/lib --propsMdDir src/generated/lib
scripts.build: npm run clean && tsc && copyfiles --flat src/generated/sql/*.sql dist/generated/sql
